title: Document Field Review
description: Used to review a single field of a document.

field_key.title: Field Key
field_key.description: Key of the document field under review:

field_title.title: Field Title
field_title.description: Title of the document field under review:

field_prompt.title: Field Prompt
field_prompt.description: Original prompt to the document field under review:

original_response.title: Original Response
original_response.description: Author's response to the document field under review:

reviewer_decision.title: Reviewer Decision
reviewer_decision.description: Outcome of reviewer's evaluation of the author's response to the document field under review:

reviewer_feedback.title: Reviewer Feedback
reviewer_feedback.description: Reviewer's feedback on the author's response to the document field under review:
